description: This file defines a React component 'ExportPdfButton' that provides a user interface button to export a specified DOM element or selector as a PDF. It includes logic for handling click events, invoking utility functions, and managing visual feedback during export.

methods.name: ExportPdfButton
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a button to export a DOM element or selector as a PDF, handling user interactions and invoking export logic.
